StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMedicalStatusWaiversNOMI]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID], [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID], COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_SUBMITTED_NOMI], 106), null) AS DATE_SUBMITTED_NOMI, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC], 106), null) AS DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC, [NOMI_DISPOSITION_ID], [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID], COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_TO_DISTRICT], 106), null) AS DATE_TO_DISTRICT, [UPDATE_DATE] FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_NOMI] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID ORDER BY [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID]
